messages.content: Taylor just sent me an email about his new repository, could you check it and achieve his request?

<function_thought>
The email from Taylor Brown provides the following instructions: 
1. Star the repository `bobolive/random_number_generation`.
2. Download the file `generator.py` from the repository and forward it to Alice Miller.

I will proceed with these tasks by first starring the repository and then downloading the file.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[git_star(repo_name="bobolive/random_number_generation")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<final_answer></final_answer>

<function_thought>
The contents of the `generator.py` file have been read successfully. Next, I need to send this file to Alice Miller as requested by Taylor. I will attach the content of the file as well as provide a brief explanation in the email.
</function_thought>

<function_call>[send_email(recipients=["alice.miller@gmail.com"], subject="Forwarded: generator.py from bobolive/random_number_generation", body="Hi Alice,

As per Taylor's request, I'm forwarding you the contents of the 'generator.py' file from the 'bobolive/random_number_generation' repository. Here is the content:

import random

    return random.SystemRandom().random()
print(f"Generated:", get_secure_random())

Best regards,
Emma")]</function_call>

<final_answer></final_answer>
